# Modify an App Store Version Phased Release

**Web Service Endpoint**

Pause or resume a phased release, or immediately release an app.

## Managing Phased Releases

- **Create an App Store Version Phased Release**: Enable phased release for an App Store version.

items.description: Enable phased release for an App Store version.
items.name: Create an App Store Version Phased Release
